title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 October 2015 - XWiki

12:38 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:15 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: where can I find the list of icons available for all icon themes?  
14:16 <vmassol> I've checked http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/IconSet and I saw bullhorn for ex but when I try it using icon:bullhorn it doesn't work  
14:16 <vmassol> ah must be http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/Silk+Mapping for now  
14:19 <vmassol> yep that's it  
14:26 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <gdelhumeau> no  
14:44 <gdelhumeau> it's http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/XWiki+Icon+Set  
14:45 <gdelhumeau> actually you should try: http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/IconThemesCode/IconPickerMacro  
14:48 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: we need a proper place where this is documented  
14:48 <vmassol> right now it doesn't exist  
14:48 <gdelhumeau> indeed  
14:49 <gdelhumeau> maybe by copying http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Proposal/XWiki+Icon+Set in extensions  
14:53 <vmassol> is there an extension representing the Icon Set?  
14:53 <vmassol> "This is the set of icons that XWiki wants to support". Does it mean it's not the case?  
14:55 <vmassol> it should be documented here IMO: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Icon+Theme+Application  
14:55 <vmassol> WDYT gdelhumeau?  
14:55 <vmassol> actually there's alreadya link  
14:55 <vmassol> so all that's needed is to move the list  
14:55 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Icon+Theme+Application#HList  
14:57 <vmassol> I think http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Icon+Theme+Application also need to be updated since it says things as ""Our final goal is to enable the icon application in the wiki syntax. So you will just have to do:"  
14:57 <vmassol> (it should not use "future" tense since it's done)  
14:58 <vmassol> Last, I think the part for developers of xwiki should be moved to dev.xwiki.org  
14:58 <Ramona1> has quit  
14:59 <gdelhumeau> I don't understand  
15:00 <gdelhumeau> using icon: in the wiki syntax is still not supported  
15:05 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/VMA  
15:06 <vmassol> you mean for themes others than silk maybe  
15:06 <gdelhumeau> yes vmassol  
15:06 <vmassol> if so that text needs to be strongly updated anyway  
15:06 <gdelhumeau> it's not using the XWiki Icon Application  
15:07 <gdelhumeau> the proof is that font awesome is not used  
15:07 <gdelhumeau> in that case  
15:07 <vmassol> I'll change it  
15:07 <vmassol> do you agree about the rest?  
15:07 <gdelhumeau> yes  
15:08 <gdelhumeau> I know that you don't want to have the icon picker in live on extensions.xwiki.org  
15:08 <gdelhumeau> that would have been great  
15:08 <gdelhumeau> to display all icons nicely  
15:24 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: the page is yours  
15:24 <vmassol> :)
